product_details.description: ⌚Movement: Japanese imported quartz analog movement and battery, provide precise time and long-term running. The watch can be used for more than 1 years. ⌚Material: The strap is made of stainless steel, comfortable and soft and breathable. Mineral glasses, 304 steel case, Suit for all kinds of occasions. ⌚Sports chronograph: Multifunctional sub-dial can work, chronograph, calendar, run seconds. Provide you with multi-function purpose use. ⌚3ATM waterproof: This watch is waterproof 30m, can withstand daily splash or short immersion in water, but not swimming and showering, diving or snorkeling. ☎After sales service: Each product has 1-year after sales service. If you have any questions about the product, please contact me immediately and we will give you a satisfactory solution. Item width - 4.2 centimeters ** Clasp type - Push Button Foldover Clasp With Safety ** Country of Origin - China **

banner_details:
This sleek promotional banner is designed to showcase a premium wristwatch product in a modern and minimalist style. The background features a smooth dark diagonal gradient with subtle wave and circle overlays for depth. The banner is vertically structured with a bold headline (`heading`) at the top, followed by a subheadline (`subheading`) that introduces the product category. The centerpiece is a high-quality product image (`product_image`) of a luxury timepiece placed centrally. Below this is a prominent price tag (`price`) in bold, white typography. A clear call-to-action button with text (`cta`) is placed within a rectangular block (`cta_button_background`), encouraging user interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black: `#1A1A1A`
- Slate Gray: `#303030`
- Shadow Gray: `#444444`
- Light Gray Text: `#D0D0D0`
- Accent Gray: `#707070`
- Highlight White: `#FFFFFF`
- Subtext Gray: `#ACACAC`
product_color: The product image shows a sleek, modern wristwatch with a monochromatic black and metallic gray color scheme, exuding luxury and sophistication. The dominant colors include glossy jet black (#0B0B0B), brushed metallic gray (#5C5C5C), steel silver (#A3A3A3), and subtle chrome highlights (#D8D8D8). The black is prominently used on the strap and casing, offering a bold frame. The gradients of gray on the dial create depth and sophistication, while the polished silver indices and sub-dials enhance readability and elegance. These colors blend smoothly with a high-gloss effect, reflecting light strategically to highlight the craftsmanship. This palette is ideal for a high-end, minimalist advertisement.
